text: Allows reading and writing in game storage from terrain generation scripts.
Loads temporary data stored by terrain generation.
params: Key used to lookup the saved data.

text: Loads data stored by terrain generation.
params: Key used to lookup the saved data.

text: Saves data produced from terrain generation and synchronizes to clients. Saved data can be retrived in later game sessions and by the game lua environment.
params: Key used to lookup the saved data.

text: Saves data produced from terrain generation. Saved data can be retrived in later game sessions and by the game lua environment.
params: Key used to lookup the saved data.

text: Sets data produced from terrain generation and synchronizes to clients. This data is only valid during the game session.
params: Key used to lookup the saved data.

text: Sets temporary data produced from terrain generation and synchronizes to clients.
params: Key used to lookup the saved data.
